metadata.description: LISTENAI's AI coding assistant skills collection

plugins.name: arcs-dev-tools
plugins.description: ARCS SDK toolchain ops: clone repo, setup environment, build, flash, run, and read serial logs.

plugins.name: commit-msg
plugins.description: Generate Chinese git commit messages based on current code changes and create signed commits.

plugins.name: sdk-assistant-agent
plugins.description: ARCS SDK / LISTENAI SDK 开发助手统一入口。自动路由驱动开发、构建调试、样例生成、组件开发、代码审查、文档编写等任务。
